name: github-release-manager
description: A web-based tool to manage GitHub releases, assets, and tags for your repositories.
author: sekedus

scripts.dev:install: npm install && npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.dev:start: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run start:frontend"
scripts.build: node scripts/install-connect-mongo.js && npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build:frontend && npx cpy "frontend/build/**" backend/public
